content.original:
Codenamed Puma by Inner Sphere forces who first engaged it, the Adder is a light Clan OmniMech that serves as a direct or an indirect fire-Zupport unit in most of its configurations. The ADR-Z only carries a pair of Society-design MRM 30s and the hard-mounted Flamers, leaving it vulnerable once the MRMs run dry. Quirk: Narrow/Low Profile Drop Cost Multiplier: 1.09

Arm Actuator Limits: Omni
content.prevOriginal: Codenamed Puma by Inner Sphere forces who first engaged it, the Adder is a light Clan OmniMech that serves as a direct or an indirect fire-Zupport unit in most of its configurations. The ADR-Z only carries a pair of Society-design MRM 30s and the hard-mounted Flamer, leaving it vulnerable once the MRMs run dry. Quirk: Narrow/Low Profile Drop Cost Multiplier: 1.09
content.content:
Получивший кодовое название «Пума» от сил Внутренней Сферы, которые первыми вступили с ним в бой, Adder - это легкий клановый омнимех, который в большинстве своих конфигураций служит для огневой поддержки как с открытых, так и закрытых позиций. ADR-Z несет пару MRM 30, разработанных Обществом, и несъёмные Flamers. Это делает его уязвимым, когда MRM иссякают. Особенность: Узкий/низкий профиль Множитель стоимости высадки: 1.09

Лимит приводов рук: Omni

content.original:
The Blood Asp Z is a Society configuration of the Star Adder's terrifying assault mech. The Z configuration mounts a pair of massive Society Heavy Gauss Rifles backed up with a pair of Medium Heavy Lasers. Like most Society designs, the Blood Asp features a series of electronics upgrades including a Nova CEWS. Quirk: Rugged Drop Cost Multiplier: 1.25

Arm Actuator Limits: Omni

content.original: Incredible boss, those Star Adders sure know how to make a solid mech. The Blood Asp is extremely fast for its tonnage with that 360 XL engine and it still somehow manages to have nearly half its weight available in pod space!
content.prevOriginal: Incredible boss, those Smoke Jaguars sure know how to make a solid mech. The Blood Asp is extremely fast for its tonnage with that 360 XL engine and it still somehow manages to have nearly half its weight available in pod space!
content.content: Невероятно, босс, эти Звёздные Ужи знают, как делать мехов. Blood Asp очень быстр для своего тоннажа, благодаря двигателю 360 XL, и при этом почти половина его веса - это вооружение!

content.original:
Dubbed the Commando IIC, this upgrade used newer technologies to outperform its venerable cousin. With the proliferation of OmniMechs, most Commando IICs were relegated to second line status which made them prime candidates for Society cabals to quietly pilfer into their own ranks. The Z variant mounts a pair of SRM4s, a pair of Medium Supra Lasers, and a Streak NARC launcher. Quirk: Narrow/Low Profile Drop Cost Multiplier: 1.12

Arm Actuator Limits: Left Lower, Right Lower
content.prevOriginal: Dubbed the Commando IIC, this upgrade used newer technologies to outperform its venerable cousin. With the proliferation of OmniMechs, most Commando IICs were relegated to second line status which made them prime candidates for Society cabals to quietly pilfer into their own ranks. The Z variant mounts a pair of SRM4s, a pair of Medium Supra Lasers, and a Streak NARC launcher. Quirk: Narrow/Low Profile Drop Cost Multiplier: 1.12
content.content:
Модификация, получившая название Commando IIC, использовала новейшие технологии, чтобы превзойти своего почтенного сородича. С распространением омнимехов, большинство Commando IIC были отнесены ко второму эшелону, что сделало их идеальными кандидатами для заговорщиков из Общества, чтобы незаметно переманить в свои ряды. Вариант Z оснащен парой SRM4, парой средних Supra лазеров и пусковой установкой Streak NARC. Особенность: Узкий/низкий профиль Множитель стоимости высадки: 1.12

Лимит приводов рук: Left Lower, Right Lower

content.original:
Despite being designed by the Star League before the Exodus, the Dragon Fire was not seen in the Inner Sphere until the 3050s. However, an updated version of the original Star League design was developed as proposed to Clan leadership during the Golden Century but was never adopted in favor of Omnimechs designs. Not willing to give up on the design, several members of the Society continued redesigning the Dragon Fire in secret. By the Wars of Reaving, the Dragon Fire IIC Omnimech is vastly more advanced than it's Inner Sphere cousin. Quirk: Rugged Drop Cost Multiplier: 1.2

Arm Actuator Limits: Omni
content.prevOriginal: Despite being designed by the Star League before the Exodus, the Dragon Fire was not seen in the Inner Sphere until the 3050s. However, an updated version of the original Star League design was developed as proposed to Clan leadership during the Golden Century but was never adopted in favor of Omnimechs designs. Not willing to give up on the design, several members of the Society continued redesigning the Dragon Fire in secret. By the Wars of Reaving, the Dragon Fire IIC Omnimech is vastly more advanced than it's Inner Sphere cousin. Quirk: Rugged Drop Cost Multiplier: 1.2
content.content:
Несмотря на то, что «Огонь Дракона» был разработан Звездной Лигой еще до Исхода, во Внутренней Сфере он появился только в 3050-х годах. Однако, в Золотом веке, Кланами был разработан обновленный вариант оригинального дизайна, который был предложен руководству Кланов, но был не принят в виде омнимеха. Не желая отказываться от проекта, несколько членов Общества продолжили тайную доработку Dragon Fire. На момент Войн Разорения омнимех Dragon Fire IIC был значительно более совершенным, чем его собрат из Внутренней Сферы. Особенность: Прочный Множитель стоимости высадки: 1.2

Лимит приводов рук: Omni

content.original:
After the Exodus, Pentagon Wars, and countless trials, the ancient Emperor design was well worn and incredibly out-of-date. Rather than spending the time to redesign the Emperor into a IIC version like many other SLDF designs, Society engineers simply designed the 6Z around a new Endo-Steel frame and a Clan-Spec XL engine. The 6Z employs a Light Ultra Gauss Rifle and ER Large Laser in each arm and an Arrow V system in the right torso. Quirk: Improved Cooling Jacket - Laser Drop Cost Multiplier: 1.3

Arm Actuator Limits: Left Lower, Right Lower
content.prevOriginal: After the Exodus, Pentagon Wars, and countless trials, the ancient Emperor design was well worn and incredibly out-of-date. Rather than spending the time to redesign the Emperor into a IIC version like many other SLDF designs, Society engineers simply designed the 6Z around a new Endo-Steel frame and a Clan-Spec XL engine. The 6Z employs a Light Ultra Gauss Rifle and ER Large Laser in each arm and an Arrow V system in the right torso. Quirk: Improved Cooling Jacket - Laser Drop Cost Multiplier: 1.3
content.content:
После Исхода, войн Пентагона и бесчисленных испытаний, древний дизайн Emperor был сильно поношен и невероятно устарел. Вместо того, чтобы тратить время на переделку Emperor в версию IIC, как многие другие проекты SLDF, инженеры Общества просто спроектировали 6Z на основе нового каркаса из эндостали и кланового XL двигателя. В каждой руке 6Z установлены Light Ultra Gauss Rifle и ER Large Laser, а в правом полуторсе - система Arrow V. Особенность: Improved Cooling Jacket - Laser Множитель стоимости высадки: 1.3

Лимит приводов рук: Left Lower, Right Lower

content.original:
Despite the design being considered obsolete well before the Exodus, the schematics for the Helepolis siege mech survived the journey to the Pentagon Worlds where it went largely ignored until the Golden Century. A small group of Coyote scientists retooled the arcane design, increasing its tonnage and applying most of the weight saving techologies available, and submitted it to their Khan. Despite being rejected as a dishonorable design the HEP-IIC survived in Society caches and has slowly been upgraded over the years. The Z variant features a pair of Arrow Vs and can only rely on a iATM3 for short-ranged defense Quirk: Stable Drop Cost Multiplier: 1.29

Arm Actuator Limits: Left Upper, Right Upper
content.prevOriginal:
Despite the design being considered obsolete well before the Exodus, the schematics for the Helepolis seige mech survived the journey to the Pentagon Worlds where it went largely ignored until the Golden Century. A small group of Coyote scientists retooled the arcane design, increasing its tonnage and applying most of the weight saving techologies available, and submitted it to their Khan. Despite being rejected as a dishonorable design the HEP-IIC survived in Society caches and has slowly been upgraded over the years. The Z variant features a pair of Arrow Vs and can only rely on a iATM3 for short-ranged defense Quirk: Stable Drop Cost Multiplier: 1.29

Arm Actuator Limits: Left Upper, Right Upper
content.content:
Несмотря на то, что конструкция была признана устаревшей задолго до Исхода, чертежи осадного меха Helepolis уцелели во время путешествия в миры Пентагона, и до Золотого века оставались практически без внимания. Небольшая группа ученых Койотов переработала заумную конструкцию, увеличив ее тоннаж и внедрив большинство доступных технологий по снижению веса, и представила ее своему хану. Несмотря на то, что HEP-IIC был отвергнут как позорный проект, он сохранился в тайниках Общества и с годами постепенно модернизировался. Вариант Z оснащен парой ракет Arrow V, а на близких дистанциях может полагаться лишь на iATM3. Особенность: Стабильный Множитель стоимости высадки: 1.29

Лимит приводов рук: Left Upper, Right Upper

content.original: Brawler & General Assault
content.prevOriginal: Brawler & General Assault
content.content: Ближний бой и прорыв

content.original: Despite the design being considered obsolete well before the Exodus, the schematics for the Helepolis siege mech survived the journey to the Pentagon Worlds where it went largely ignored until the Golden Century. A small group of Coyote scientists retooled the arcane design, increasing its tonnage and applying most of the weight saving techologies available, and submitted it to their Khan. Despite being rejected as a dishonorable design the HEP-IIC survived in Society caches and has slowly been upgraded over the years. The Z variant sports a Sniper Artillery Piece and a Society MRM60.

content.original:
The Highlander IIC Z is a Society prototype developed as an Assault test-bed for the new Advanced Torso-Mount Cockpit. The HGN-IIC Z keeps the iconic Gauss Rifle and Jump Jets of its predecessors but sports a pair of Society MRM30s and a trio of Small Supra Lasers as its remaining armament. Quirk: Reinforced Legs Drop Cost Multiplier: 1.3

Arm Actuator Limit: Right Lower

content.content:
Highlander IIC Z - прототип, разработанный Обществом в качестве штурмовой платформы для испытаний новой усовершенствованной корпусной кабины. HGN-IIC Z сохранил легендарную пушку Гаусса и прыжковые двигатели своих предшественников, а в качестве остального вооружения получил пару МРМ30 и трио малых Supra лазеров. Особенность: Укреплённые ноги Множитель стоимости высадки: 1.3

Лимит приводов рук: Right Lower

content.original:
Superheavy 'Mechs were often considered nothing more than a pipe-dream. So when the Wars of Reaving began and the Society's Hyperion strode onto the battlefield, Clan leadership was rightfully troubled. Built using the latest technologies available, the Hyperion can keep pace with many Assault 'Mechs while carrying substantially more armor and more pod-space. Quirk: Distracting Drop Cost Multiplier: 1.3

Arm Actuator Limits: Omni

content.original:
Considered a by-gone design by the time of the Reunification Wars, the Icarus II rarely crossed paths with the Star League Defense Force and was not even much of an afterthought after the Exodus to Clan Space. This fairly unremarkable history made the shock of the Icarus IIC's appearance that much more shocking. This Omni-Mech redesign was proposed to both Jade Falcon and Steel Viper leadership who rejected it outright. However, the design survived and evolved thanks to a few Society cells. Quirk: Improved Targeting - Short Drop Cost Multiplier: 1.05

Arm Actuator Limits: Omni
content.prevOriginal: Considered a by-gone design by the time of the Reunification Wars, the Icarus II rarely crossed paths with the Star League Defense Force and was not even much of an afterthought after the Exodus to Clan Space. This fairly unremarkable history made the shock of the Icarus IIC's appearance that much more shocking. This Omni-Mech redesign was proposed to both Jade Falcon and Steel Viper leadership who rejected it outright. However, the design survived and evolved thanks to a few Society cells. Quirk: Improved Targeting - Short Drop Cost Multiplier: 1.05
content.content:
К моменту Войн Воссоединения, Icarus II считался устаревшей разработкой и редко встречался в Силах обороны Звездной Лиги, а после Исхода в Пространство Кланов и вовсе остался без внимания. Столь непримечательное прошлое сделало появление Icarus IIC еще более шокирующим. Этот проект омнимеха был предложен руководству Нефритовых Соколов и Стальных Гадюк, которые отвергли его. Однако благодаря нескольким ячейкам Общества проект выжил и получил дальнейшее развитие. Особенность: Улучшенное наведение - Short Множитель стоимости высадки: 1.05

Лимит приводов рук: Omni

Столь непримечательное прошлое сделало появление Icarus IIC еще более шокирующим. Этот проект омнимеха был предложен руководству Нефритовых Соколов и Стальных Гадюк, которые отвергли его. Однако благодаря нескольким ячейкам Общества проект выжил и получил дальнейшее развитие. Особенность: Улучшенное наведение - Short Множитель стоимости высадки: 1.05

Лимит приводов рук: Omni

content.original: Considered a by-gone design by the time of the Reunification Wars, the Icarus II rarely crossed paths with the Star League Defense Force and was not even much of an afterthought after the Exodus to Clan Space. This fairly unremarkable history made the shock of the Icarus IIC's appearance that much more shocking. This Omni-Mech redesign was proposed to both Jade Falcon and Steel Viper leadership who rejected it outright. However, the design survived and evolved thanks to a few Society cells.

content.original: As a Second-Line mech, the Incubus was a prime candidate for Society engineers to refit into a light mech capable of being integrated into Society formations easily. The Incubus Z drops the Large Pulse Laser for a Large Supra Laser and drops the ER Medium for a Nova CEWS. Quirk: Accurate Weapon - Laser Drop Cost Multiplier: 1.13

content.original:
A Light Clan OmniMech, the 30 ton Kit Fox was introduced in 2890 by Clan Cloud Cobra. Favouring a mix of fire power and armor over speed, the Kit Fox is powered by a 180 XL Engine and features a mix of Endo Steel and Ferro Fibrous; giving it 16 tons of pod space. The Kit Fox Z is armed with a Large Supra Laser and an ER Small Laser. A pair of Laser AMS, a Streak Narc and a TAG round out the Society variant. Quirk: Narrow/Low Profile Drop Cost Multiplier: 1.08

Arm Actuator Limits: Omni
content.prevOriginal: A Light Clan OmniMech, the 30 ton Kit Fox was introduced in 2890 by Clan Cloud Cobra. Favouring a mix of fire power and armor over speed, the Kit Fox is powered by a 180 XL Engine and features a mix of Endo Steel and Ferro Fibrous; giving it 16 tons of pod space. The Kit Fox Z is armed with a Large Supra Laser and an ER Small Laser. A pair of Laser AMS, a Streak Narc and a TAG round out the Society variant. Quirk: Narrow/Low Profile Drop Cost Multiplier: 1.08
content.content:
Легкий клановый омнимех Kit Fox весом 30 тонн был представлен кланом Облачной Кобры в 2890 году. Отдавая предпочтение сочетанию огневой мощи и брони, а не скорости, Kit Fox оснащен двигателем 180 XL и имеет комбо из эндостали и феррофибры, что обеспечивает ему 16 тонн пространства под вооружение. Kit Fox Z вооружен большим Supra лазером и малым ER лазером. Пара лазерных AMS, Streak Narc и TAG дополняют этот вариант от Общества. Особенность: Узкий/низкий профиль Множитель стоимости высадки: 1.08

Лимит приводов рук: Omni

content.original:
One of the best known BattleMechs in the Inner Sphere for its low production and operation costs, the Locust is also well known in the Clans. In 2832, Clan Mongoose unleashed an upgraded version of the venerable 'Mech on the Clans, known as the Locust IIC. The Z variant is a Society refit that replaces the engine with a 200SL engine and replaces the weapons payload with 6 Small Supra Lasers and a Nova CEWS. Quirk: Narrow/Low Profile Drop Cost Multiplier: 1.12

Arm Actuator Limits: Left Upper, Right Upper
content.prevOriginal: One of the best known BattleMechs in the Inner Sphere for its low production and operation costs, the Locust is also well known in the Clans. In 2832, Clan Mongoose unleashed an upgraded version of the venerable 'Mech on the Clans, known as the Locust IIC. The Z variant is a Society refit that replaces the engine with a 200SL engine and replaces the weapons payload with 6 Small Supra Lasers and a Nova CEWS. Quirk: Narrow/Low Profile Drop Cost Multiplier: 1.12
content.content:
Один из наиболее известных боевых мехов во Внутренней Сфере, благодаря низкой стоимости производства и эксплуатации, Locust также хорошо известен и в Кланах. В 2832 году клан Мангуста выпустил модернизированную версию этого почтенного меха, известную как Locust IIC. Вариант Z представляет собой модернизацию, в ходе которой двигатель был заменен на 200SL, а вооружение было заменено на 6 малых Supra лазеров и Nova CEWS. Особенность: Узкий/низкий профиль Множитель стоимости высадки: 1.12

Лимит приводов рук: Left Upper, Right Upper

Built on the Marauder IIC workhorse chassis, the Z variant eschews the ERPPCs for a Society Heavy Gauss Rifle, a quartet of Medium Supra Lasers, a prototype supercharged light 340SL engine and four Jump Jets for mobility. Quirk: Hyper-Extending Actuators Drop Cost Multiplier: 1.29

Arm Actuator Limits: Left Lower, Right Lower

content.original: The Rabid Coyote was designed by scientists from Clan Coyote to be a complement to other, slower BattleMechs. First deployed in 3066, the 'Mech was deployed in an effort to stave off the slow decline of the previous decades that had befallen the Clan that created the OmniMech. Curiously, as the 'Mech is intended to be a bodyguard for larger 'Mechs like the Savage Coyote, front-line warriors spurn the design because they do not wish to be seen merely as "support". Quirk: Experimental TC Drop Cost Multiplier: 1.19
content.prevOriginal: The Rabid Coyote was designed by scientists from Clan Coyote to be a complement to other, slower BattleMechs. First deployed in 3066, the 'Mech was deployed in an effort to stave off the slow decline of the previous decades that had befallen the Clan that created the OmniMech. With an eye towards cost, the Rabid Coyote employs a standard fusion engine, though it does make use of an Endo Steel internal structure and eight and a half tons of Ferro-Fibrous armor. Curiously, as the 'Mech is intended to be a bodyguard for larger 'Mechs like the Savage Coyote, front-line warriors spurn the design because they do not wish to be seen merely as ''support''. Quirk: Experimental TC Drop Cost Multiplier: 1.23

First deployed in 3066, the 'Mech was deployed in an effort to stave off the slow decline of the previous decades that had befallen the Clan that created the OmniMech. Curiously, as the 'Mech is intended to be a bodyguard for larger 'Mechs like the Savage Coyote, front-line warriors spurn the design because they do not wish to be seen merely as "support".

content.original:
The Rifleman IIC Z is a Society refit designed to provide direct fire support for Society mech formations. The S variant sports a Light Ultra Gauss Rifle and a Large Supra Laser in each arm, providing a frightening amount of firepower at range, and a suite of improved electonics including a Nova CEWS. Quirk: Integrated Searchlight Drop Cost Multiplier: 1.23

Arm Actuator Limits: Left Upper, Right Upper

content.original: The Shadowhawk IIC Z has very little in common with its other SHD-IIC cousins thanks to extensive modifications by Society Engineers. Designed to be a devastating guerilla warefare mech, the SHD-IIC S features a Chameleon Light Polarization Shield, Nova CEWS, Advanced Torso Mounted Cockpit, a Snub-Nosed PPC, and a pair of Medium Heavy Lasers. Most S variants also carried a pair of T.A.E. dispensors for area and asset denial operations. Quirk: Battle Fists Drop Cost Multiplier: 1.17

content.original:
Considered lowly, even for garrison troops, the UrbanMech IIC was thought to be under-appreciated until Clan leadership found that several Society cells were siphoning them into their ranks. The UM-IIC-Z variant is a deadly city combatant whose Heavy Plasma Cannon can vaporize swathes of infantry, chunks of buildings, and vast amounts of enemy armor. Quirk: 360° Torso Twist Drop Cost Multiplier: 1.13

Arm Actuator Limits: Left Upper, Right Upper
content.prevOriginal: Considered lowly, even for garrison troops, the UrbanMech IIC was thought to be under-appreciated until Clan leadership found that several Society cells were siphoning them into their ranks. The UM-IIC-Z variant is a deadly city combatant whose Heavy Plasma Cannon can vaporize swathes of infantry, chunks of buildings, and vast amounts of enemy armor. Quirk: 360° Torso Twist Drop Cost Multiplier: 1.13

UrbanMech IIC считался малоценным даже для гарнизонных войск, пока руководство Кланов не обнаружило, что несколько ячеек Общества перетягивают их в свои ряды. Вариант UM-IIC-Z - это смертоносный городской боец, чья Heavy Plasma Cannon способна уничтожать пехоту, куски зданий и огромное количество вражеской брони. Особенность: 360° вращение торса Множитель стоимости высадки: 1.13

content.prevOriginal: Heavy Defender
content.content: Тяжелый защитник

content.original: A refit designed for garrison troops, the Urbanmech IICr was as a stop gap upgrade utilised by Clan Snow Raven and later the Raven Alliance; to guard against piracy attacks on their frontier holdings. Trading the traditional IIC armament for a pair of Heavy Large Lasers and enough heat sinks to keep it more or less functional in combat, it is capable of delivering a knockout punch against adversaries far exceeding it’s own weight . The raw fire power of the Heavy Lasers forces the pilot to alternate their firing sequences to minimise heat build up or risk a shutdown. Never a popular mech, it found a new life as a training mech in the Alliance armed forces; teaching sibko the importance of heat management and battlefield awareness.

content.original: Despite the Society's distaste for the Warrior Caste's insistance on adhering to zellbrigen, they did see value in attempting to best these warriors in one-on-one combat. The Vapor Eagle Z variant utilizes a Snub-Nosed PPC and a pair of MRM15s to brutalize close-combatants and relies on its speed, Nova CEWS, and torso-mounted cockpit for survivability. Quirk: Nimble Drop Cost Multiplier: 1.19

content.original:
After the relative success of the VTR-9B refits, the Victor IIC was proposed to Clan leadership as the next stage of the design's evolution. The original proposition featured an Endo-Steel frame and an XL engine, the cost of which doomed it to rejection. The VTR-IIC-Z was a small production variantion of these forsaken designs; it features a UAC/20 supported by an array of Society prototypes and electronics, all focused on close-range brawling. Quirk: Rugged Drop Cost Multiplier: 1.28

Arm Actuator Limit: Right Upper
content.prevOriginal:
After the relative success of the VTR-9B refits, the Victor IIC was proposed to Clan leadership as the next stage of the design's evolution. The original proposition featured an Endo-Steel frame and an XL engine which doomed if for rejection due to costs. The VTR-IIC-Z was a small production variantion of these forsaken designs; it featuresa UAC/20 supported by an array of Society prototypes and electronics all focused on close-range brawling. Quirk: Rugged Drop Cost Multiplier: 1.28

Arm Actuator Limit: Right Upper
content.content:
После относительного успеха рефита VTR-9B, руководству Кланов был предложен проект Victor IIC как следующий этап эволюции шасси. Первоначальное предложение включало каркас из эндостали и двигатель XL, из-за чего от меха позже отказались, из-за стоимости. VTR-IIC-Z был мелкосерийным вариантом этого заброшенного шасси; он оснащен UAC/20, поддерживаемым множеством оружий-прототипов от Общества и электроникой, ориентированной на ведение боя на близких дистанциях. Особенность: Прочный Множитель стоимости высадки: 1.28

Лимит приводов рук: Right Upper

content.original:
The original Warhammer was designed as an assault BattleMech. The Clans wisely maintained and built on this solid frame a real assault 'Mech, the Warhammer IIC. The Z is a Society variant that sports a pair of experimental Heavy Plasma Cannons capable of slagging most anything found on the battlefield. Quirk: Integrated Searchlight Drop Cost Multiplier: 1.28

Arm Actuator Limits: Left Lower, Right Lower
content.prevOriginal: The original Warhammer was designed as an assault BattleMech. The Clans wisely maintained and built on this solid frame a real assault 'Mech, the Warhammer IIC. The Z is a Society variant that sports a pair of experimental Heavy Plasma Cannons capable of slagging most anything found on the battlefield. Quirk: Integrated Searchlight Drop Cost Multiplier: 1.28
content.content:
Оригинальный Warhammer был разработан как тяжёлый боевой мех. Кланы построили на его основе настоящий штурмовой мех - Warhammer IIC. Вариант Z - это вариант от Общества, оснащенный парой экспериментальных Heavy Plasma Cannons, способных уничтожить почти все, что встречается на поле боя. Особенность: Встроенный прожектор Множитель стоимости высадки: 1.28

Лимит приводов рук: Left Lower, Right Lower

content.prevOriginal: Brawler & Close Assault
content.content: Ближний штурм

content.original: The original Warhammer was designed as an assault BattleMech. The Clans wisely maintained and built on this solid frame a real assault 'Mech, the Warhammer IIC. The Z is a Society variant that sports a pair of experimental Heavy Plasma Cannons capable of slagging most anything found on the battlefield.

content.original:
Codenamed Puma by Inner Sphere forces who first engaged it, the Adder is a light Clan OmniMech that serves as a direct or an indirect fire-Zupport unit in most of its configurations. The ADR-Z only carries a pair of Society-design MRM 30s and the hard-mounted Flamers, leaving it vulnerable once the MRMs run dry. Quirk: Narrow/Low Profile Drop Cost Multiplier: 1.09

Arm Actuator Limits: Omni
content.prevOriginal: Codenamed Puma by Inner Sphere forces who first engaged it, the Adder is a light Clan OmniMech that serves as a direct or an indirect fire-Zupport unit in most of its configurations. The ADR-Z only carries a pair of Society-design MRM 30s and the hard-mounted Flamer, leaving it vulnerable once the MRMs run dry. Quirk: Narrow/Low Profile Drop Cost Multiplier: 1.09
content.content:
Получивший кодовое название «Пума» от сил Внутренней Сферы, которые первыми вступили с ним в бой, Adder - это легкий клановый омнимех, который в большинстве своих конфигураций служит для огневой поддержки как с открытых, так и закрытых позиций. ADR-Z несет пару MRM 30, разработанных Обществом, и несъёмные Flamers. Это делает его уязвимым, когда MRM иссякают. Особенность: Узкий/низкий профиль Множитель стоимости высадки: 1.09

Лимит приводов рук: Omni

content.original:
The Blood Asp Z is a Society configuration of the Star Adder's terrifying assault mech. The Z configuration mounts a pair of massive Society Heavy Gauss Rifles backed up with a pair of Medium Heavy Lasers. Like most Society designs, the Blood Asp features a series of electronics upgrades including a Nova CEWS. Quirk: Rugged Drop Cost Multiplier: 1.25

Arm Actuator Limits: Omni
content.prevOriginal: The Blood Asp Z is a Society configuration of the Smoke Jaguar's terrifying assault mech. The Z configuration mounts a pair of massive Society Heavy Gauss Rifles backed up with a pair of Medium Heavy Lasers. Like most Society designs, the Blood Asp features a series of electronics upgrades including a Nova CEWS. Quirk: Rugged Drop Cost Multiplier: 1.25

Лимит приводов рук: Omni

content.original:
Dubbed the Commando IIC, this upgrade used newer technologies to outperform its venerable cousin. With the proliferation of OmniMechs, most Commando IICs were relegated to second line status which made them prime candidates for Society cabals to quietly pilfer into their own ranks. The Z variant mounts a pair of SRM4s, a pair of Medium Supra Lasers, and a Streak NARC launcher. Quirk: Narrow/Low Profile Drop Cost Multiplier: 1.12

Arm Actuator Limits: Left Lower, Right Lower
content.prevOriginal: Dubbed the Commando IIC, this upgrade used newer technologies to outperform its venerable cousin. With the proliferation of OmniMechs, most Commando IICs were relegated to second line status which made them prime candidates for Society cabals to quietly pilfer into their own ranks. The Z variant mounts a pair of SRM4s, a pair of Medium Supra Lasers, and a Streak NARC launcher. Quirk: Narrow/Low Profile Drop Cost Multiplier: 1.12
content.content:
Модификация, получившая название Commando IIC, использовала новейшие технологии, чтобы превзойти своего почтенного сородича. С распространением омнимехов, большинство Commando IIC были отнесены ко второму эшелону, что сделало их идеальными кандидатами для заговорщиков из Общества, чтобы незаметно переманить в свои ряды. Вариант Z оснащен парой SRM4, парой средних Supra лазеров и пусковой установкой Streak NARC. Особенность: Узкий/низкий профиль Множитель стоимости высадки: 1.12

Лимит приводов рук: Left Lower, Right Lower

content.original:
Despite being designed by the Star League before the Exodus, the Dragon Fire was not seen in the Inner Sphere until the 3050s. However, an updated version of the original Star League design was developed as proposed to Clan leadership during the Golden Century but was never adopted in favor of Omnimechs designs. Not willing to give up on the design, several members of the Society continued redesigning the Dragon Fire in secret. By the Wars of Reaving, the Dragon Fire IIC Omnimech is vastly more advanced than it's Inner Sphere cousin. Quirk: Rugged Drop Cost Multiplier: 1.2

Arm Actuator Limits: Omni
content.prevOriginal: Despite being designed by the Star League before the Exodus, the Dragon Fire was not seen in the Inner Sphere until the 3050s. However, an updated version of the original Star League design was developed as proposed to Clan leadership during the Golden Century but was never adopted in favor of Omnimechs designs. Not willing to give up on the design, several members of the Society continued redesigning the Dragon Fire in secret. By the Wars of Reaving, the Dragon Fire IIC Omnimech is vastly more advanced than it's Inner Sphere cousin. Quirk: Rugged Drop Cost Multiplier: 1.2
content.content:
Несмотря на то, что «Огонь Дракона» был разработан Звездной Лигой еще до Исхода, во Внутренней Сфере он появился только в 3050-х годах. Однако, в Золотом веке, Кланами был разработан обновленный вариант оригинального дизайна, который был предложен руководству Кланов, но был не принят в виде омнимеха. Не желая отказываться от проекта, несколько членов Общества продолжили тайную доработку Dragon Fire. На момент Войн Разорения омнимех Dragon Fire IIC был значительно более совершенным, чем его собрат из Внутренней Сферы. Особенность: Прочный Множитель стоимости высадки: 1.2

Лимит приводов рук: Omni

content.original:
After the Exodus, Pentagon Wars, and countless trials, the ancient Emperor design was well worn and incredibly out-of-date. Rather than spending the time to redesign the Emperor into a IIC version like many other SLDF designs, Society engineers simply designed the 6Z around a new Endo-Steel frame and a Clan-Spec XL engine. The 6Z employs a Light Ultra Gauss Rifle and ER Large Laser in each arm and an Arrow V system in the right torso. Quirk: Improved Cooling Jacket - Laser Drop Cost Multiplier: 1.3

Arm Actuator Limits: Left Lower, Right Lower
content.prevOriginal: After the Exodus, Pentagon Wars, and countless trials, the ancient Emperor design was well worn and incredibly out-of-date. Rather than spending the time to redesign the Emperor into a IIC version like many other SLDF designs, Society engineers simply designed the 6Z around a new Endo-Steel frame and a Clan-Spec XL engine. The 6Z employs a Light Ultra Gauss Rifle and ER Large Laser in each arm and an Arrow V system in the right torso. Quirk: Improved Cooling Jacket - Laser Drop Cost Multiplier: 1.3
content.content:
После Исхода, войн Пентагона и бесчисленных испытаний, древний дизайн Emperor был сильно поношен и невероятно устарел. Вместо того, чтобы тратить время на переделку Emperor в версию IIC, как многие другие проекты SLDF, инженеры Общества просто спроектировали 6Z на основе нового каркаса из эндостали и кланового XL двигателя. В каждой руке 6Z установлены Light Ultra Gauss Rifle и ER Large Laser, а в правом полуторсе - система Arrow V. Особенность: Improved Cooling Jacket - Laser Множитель стоимости высадки: 1.3

Лимит приводов рук: Left Lower, Right Lower

content.original: The Clans upgraded the venerable Griffin design until the BattleMech now known as the Griffin IIC emerged. The Z variant is a Society refit that packs a pair of Light TAGs, a pair of Medium Supra Lasers, an iATM9, and a Streak NARC. Quirk: Battle Fists Drop Cost Multiplier: 1.16

content.original: The Clans upgraded the venerable Griffin design until the BattleMech now known as the Griffin IIC emerged. The ZA variant is a Society refit that packs a pair of Tesla Rifles, pair of Medium Supra Lasers, and a Society MRM30. Quirk: Battle Fists Drop Cost Multiplier: 1.16

content.original:
Despite the design being considered obsolete well before the Exodus, the schematics for the Helepolis siege mech survived the journey to the Pentagon Worlds where it went largely ignored until the Golden Century. A small group of Coyote scientists retooled the arcane design, increasing its tonnage and applying most of the weight saving techologies available, and submitted it to their Khan. Despite being rejected as a dishonorable design the HEP-IIC survived in Society caches and has slowly been upgraded over the years. The Z variant features a pair of Arrow Vs and can only rely on a iATM3 for short-ranged defense Quirk: Stable Drop Cost Multiplier: 1.29

Arm Actuator Limits: Left Upper, Right Upper
content.prevOriginal:
Despite the design being considered obsolete well before the Exodus, the schematics for the Helepolis seige mech survived the journey to the Pentagon Worlds where it went largely ignored until the Golden Century. A small group of Coyote scientists retooled the arcane design, increasing its tonnage and applying most of the weight saving techologies available, and submitted it to their Khan. Despite being rejected as a dishonorable design the HEP-IIC survived in Society caches and has slowly been upgraded over the years. The Z variant features a pair of Arrow Vs and can only rely on a iATM3 for short-ranged defense Quirk: Stable Drop Cost Multiplier: 1.29

Arm Actuator Limits: Left Upper, Right Upper
content.content:
Несмотря на то, что конструкция была признана устаревшей задолго до Исхода, чертежи осадного меха Helepolis уцелели во время путешествия в миры Пентагона, и до Золотого века оставались практически без внимания. Небольшая группа ученых Койотов переработала заумную конструкцию, увеличив ее тоннаж и внедрив большинство доступных технологий по снижению веса, и представила ее своему хану. Несмотря на то, что HEP-IIC был отвергнут как позорный проект, он сохранился в тайниках Общества и с годами постепенно модернизировался. Вариант Z оснащен парой ракет Arrow V, а на близких дистанциях может полагаться лишь на iATM3. Особенность: Стабильный Множитель стоимости высадки: 1.29

Лимит приводов рук: Left Upper, Right Upper

content.original:
The Highlander IIC Z is a Society prototype developed as an Assault test-bed for the new Advanced Torso-Mount Cockpit. The HGN-IIC Z keeps the iconic Gauss Rifle and Jump Jets of its predecessors but sports a pair of Society MRM30s and a trio of Small Supra Lasers as its remaining armament. Quirk: Reinforced Legs Drop Cost Multiplier: 1.3

Arm Actuator Limit: Right Lower
content.prevOriginal: The Highlander IIC Z is a Society prototype developed as an Assault test-bed for the new Advanced Torso-Mount Cockpit. The HGN-IIC Z keeps the iconic Gauss Rifle and Jump Jets of its predecessors but sports a pair of Society MRM30s and a trio of Small Supra Lasers as its remaining armament. Quirk: Reinforced Legs Drop Cost Multiplier: 1.3
content.content:
Highlander IIC Z - прототип, разработанный Обществом в качестве штурмовой платформы для испытаний новой усовершенствованной корпусной кабины. HGN-IIC Z сохранил легендарную пушку Гаусса и прыжковые двигатели своих предшественников, а в качестве остального вооружения получил пару МРМ30 и трио малых Supra лазеров. Особенность: Укреплённые ноги Множитель стоимости высадки: 1.3

Лимит приводов рук: Right Lower

content.original:
Superheavy 'Mechs were often considered nothing more than a pipe-dream. So when the Wars of Reaving began and the Society's Hyperion strode onto the battlefield, Clan leadership was rightfully troubled. Built using the latest technologies available, the Hyperion can keep pace with many Assault 'Mechs while carrying substantially more armor and more pod-space. Quirk: Distracting Drop Cost Multiplier: 1.3

Arm Actuator Limits: Omni

content.original:
Considered a by-gone design by the time of the Reunification Wars, the Icarus II rarely crossed paths with the Star League Defense Force and was not even much of an afterthought after the Exodus to Clan Space. This fairly unremarkable history made the shock of the Icarus IIC's appearance that much more shocking. This Omni-Mech redesign was proposed to both Jade Falcon and Steel Viper leadership who rejected it outright. However, the design survived and evolved thanks to a few Society cells. Quirk: Improved Targeting - Short Drop Cost Multiplier: 1.05

Arm Actuator Limits: Omni
content.prevOriginal: Considered a by-gone design by the time of the Reunification Wars, the Icarus II rarely crossed paths with the Star League Defense Force and was not even much of an afterthought after the Exodus to Clan Space. This fairly unremarkable history made the shock of the Icarus IIC's appearance that much more shocking. This Omni-Mech redesign was proposed to both Jade Falcon and Steel Viper leadership who rejected it outright. However, the design survived and evolved thanks to a few Society cells. Quirk: Improved Targeting - Short Drop Cost Multiplier: 1.05
content.content:
К моменту Войн Воссоединения, Icarus II считался устаревшей разработкой и редко встречался в Силах обороны Звездной Лиги, а после Исхода в Пространство Кланов и вовсе остался без внимания. Столь непримечательное прошлое сделало появление Icarus IIC еще более шокирующим. Этот проект омнимеха был предложен руководству Нефритовых Соколов и Стальных Гадюк, которые отвергли его. Однако благодаря нескольким ячейкам Общества проект выжил и получил дальнейшее развитие. Особенность: Улучшенное наведение - Short Множитель стоимости высадки: 1.05

Лимит приводов рук: Omni

content.original: As a Second-Line mech, the Incubus was a prime candidate for Society engineers to refit into a light mech capable of being integrated into Society formations easily. The Incubus Z drops the Large Pulse Laser for a Large Supra Laser and drops the ER Medium for a Nova CEWS. Quirk: Accurate Weapon - Laser Drop Cost Multiplier: 1.13

content.original:
A Light Clan OmniMech, the 30 ton Kit Fox was introduced in 2890 by Clan Cloud Cobra. Favouring a mix of fire power and armor over speed, the Kit Fox is powered by a 180 XL Engine and features a mix of Endo Steel and Ferro Fibrous; giving it 16 tons of pod space. The Kit Fox Z is armed with a Large Supra Laser and an ER Small Laser. A pair of Laser AMS, a Streak Narc and a TAG round out the Society variant. Quirk: Narrow/Low Profile Drop Cost Multiplier: 1.08

Arm Actuator Limits: Omni
content.prevOriginal: A Light Clan OmniMech, the 30 ton Kit Fox was introduced in 2890 by Clan Cloud Cobra. Favouring a mix of fire power and armor over speed, the Kit Fox is powered by a 180 XL Engine and features a mix of Endo Steel and Ferro Fibrous; giving it 16 tons of pod space. The Kit Fox Z is armed with a Large Supra Laser and an ER Small Laser. A pair of Laser AMS, a Streak Narc and a TAG round out the Society variant. Quirk: Narrow/Low Profile Drop Cost Multiplier: 1.08
content.content:
Легкий клановый омнимех Kit Fox весом 30 тонн был представлен кланом Облачной Кобры в 2890 году. Отдавая предпочтение сочетанию огневой мощи и брони, а не скорости, Kit Fox оснащен двигателем 180 XL и имеет комбо из эндостали и феррофибры, что обеспечивает ему 16 тонн пространства под вооружение. Kit Fox Z вооружен большим Supra лазером и малым ER лазером. Пара лазерных AMS, Streak Narc и TAG дополняют этот вариант от Общества. Особенность: Узкий/низкий профиль Множитель стоимости высадки: 1.08

Лимит приводов рук: Omni

content.original:
One of the best known BattleMechs in the Inner Sphere for its low production and operation costs, the Locust is also well known in the Clans. In 2832, Clan Mongoose unleashed an upgraded version of the venerable 'Mech on the Clans, known as the Locust IIC. The Z variant is a Society refit that replaces the engine with a 200SL engine and replaces the weapons payload with 6 Small Supra Lasers and a Nova CEWS. Quirk: Narrow/Low Profile Drop Cost Multiplier: 1.12

Arm Actuator Limits: Left Upper, Right Upper
content.prevOriginal: One of the best known BattleMechs in the Inner Sphere for its low production and operation costs, the Locust is also well known in the Clans. In 2832, Clan Mongoose unleashed an upgraded version of the venerable 'Mech on the Clans, known as the Locust IIC. The Z variant is a Society refit that replaces the engine with a 200SL engine and replaces the weapons payload with 6 Small Supra Lasers and a Nova CEWS. Quirk: Narrow/Low Profile Drop Cost Multiplier: 1.12
content.content:
Один из наиболее известных боевых мехов во Внутренней Сфере, благодаря низкой стоимости производства и эксплуатации, Locust также хорошо известен и в Кланах. В 2832 году клан Мангуста выпустил модернизированную версию этого почтенного меха, известную как Locust IIC. Вариант Z представляет собой модернизацию, в ходе которой двигатель был заменен на 200SL, а вооружение было заменено на 6 малых Supra лазеров и Nova CEWS. Особенность: Узкий/низкий профиль Множитель стоимости высадки: 1.12

Лимит приводов рук: Left Upper, Right Upper

content.original:
Built on the Marauder IIC workhorse chassis, the Z variant eschews the ERPPCs for a Society Heavy Gauss Rifle, a quartet of Medium Supra Lasers, a prototype supercharged light 340SL engine and four Jump Jets for mobility. Quirk: Hyper-Extending Actuators Drop Cost Multiplier: 1.29

Arm Actuator Limits: Left Lower, Right Lower

Построенный на основе «рабочей лошадки» - Marauder IIC, вариант Z отказался от ERPPC в пользу Heavy Gauss Rifle от Общества, квартета средних Supra лазеров, прототипного легкого двигателя 340SL и четырех прыжковых двигателей для мобильности. Особенность: Гиперрасширяющиеся приводы Множитель стоимости высадки: 1.29

Лимит приводов рук: Left Lower, Right Lower

content.original: The Rabid Coyote was designed by scientists from Clan Coyote to be a complement to other, slower BattleMechs. First deployed in 3066, the 'Mech was deployed in an effort to stave off the slow decline of the previous decades that had befallen the Clan that created the OmniMech. Curiously, as the 'Mech is intended to be a bodyguard for larger 'Mechs like the Savage Coyote, front-line warriors spurn the design because they do not wish to be seen merely as "support". Quirk: Experimental TC Drop Cost Multiplier: 1.19
content.prevOriginal: The Rabid Coyote was designed by scientists from Clan Coyote to be a complement to other, slower BattleMechs. First deployed in 3066, the 'Mech was deployed in an effort to stave off the slow decline of the previous decades that had befallen the Clan that created the OmniMech. With an eye towards cost, the Rabid Coyote employs a standard fusion engine, though it does make use of an Endo Steel internal structure and eight and a half tons of Ferro-Fibrous armor. Curiously, as the 'Mech is intended to be a bodyguard for larger 'Mechs like the Savage Coyote, front-line warriors spurn the design because they do not wish to be seen merely as ''support''. Quirk: Experimental TC Drop Cost Multiplier: 1.23

content.original:
The Rifleman IIC Z is a Society refit designed to provide direct fire support for Society mech formations. The S variant sports a Light Ultra Gauss Rifle and a Large Supra Laser in each arm, providing a frightening amount of firepower at range, and a suite of improved electonics including a Nova CEWS. Quirk: Integrated Searchlight Drop Cost Multiplier: 1.23

Arm Actuator Limits: Left Upper, Right Upper
content.prevOriginal: The Rifleman IIC Z is a Society refit designed to provide direct fire support for Society mech formations. The S variant sports a Light Ultra Gauss Rifle and a Large Supra Laser in each arm, providing a frightening amount of firepower at range, and a suite of improved electonics including a Nova CEWS. Quirk: Integrated Searchlight Drop Cost Multiplier: 1.23
content.content:
Rifleman IIC Z - это модификация, предназначенная для непосредственной огневой поддержки мех-формирований Общества. Вариант S оснащен Light Ultra Gauss Rifle и Large Supra Laser в каждой руке, что обеспечивает пугающую огневую мощь на расстоянии, а также набором улучшенной электроники, включая Nova CEWS. Особенность: Встроенный прожектор Множитель стоимости высадки: 1.23

Лимит приводов рук: Left Upper, Right Upper

content.original:
A Society configuration of the relatively young Shadow Cat Omni-Mech, the Z config replaces the Gauss Rifle with a Society MRM60 and the ER Medium Lasers with Heavy Medium Lasers. Where possible, Society engineers also incluided additional or upgraded systems and a Nova CEWS to provide superior EW capabilities. Quirk: Narrow/Low Profile Drop Cost Multiplier: 1.12

Arm Actuator Limits: Omni
content.prevOriginal: A Society configuration of the relatively young Shadow Cat Omni-Mech, the Z config replaces the Gauss Rifle with a Society MRM60 and the ER Medium Lasers with Heavy Medium Lasers. Where possible, Society engineers also incluided additional or upgraded systems and a Nova CEWS to provide superior EW capabilities. Quirk: Narrow/Low Profile Drop Cost Multiplier: 1.12
content.content:
В конфигурации Z, разработанной Обществом для сравнительно молодого омнимеха Shadow Cat, пушка Гаусса заменена на MRM60, а средние ER лазеры - на тяжелые средние. Там, где это было возможно, инженеры Общества внедрили дополнения и улучшения, в том числе Nova CEWS для обеспечения превосходных возможностей электронной борьбы. Особенность: Узкий/низкий профиль Множитель стоимости высадки: 1.12

Лимит приводов рук: Omni

content.original: The Shadowhawk IIC Z has very little in common with its other SHD-IIC cousins thanks to extensive modifications by Society Engineers. Designed to be a devastating guerilla warefare mech, the SHD-IIC S features a Chameleon Light Polarization Shield, Nova CEWS, Advanced Torso Mounted Cockpit, a Snub-Nosed PPC, and a pair of Medium Heavy Lasers. Most S variants also carried a pair of T.A.E. dispensors for area and asset denial operations. Quirk: Battle Fists Drop Cost Multiplier: 1.17

content.original:
Considered lowly, even for garrison troops, the UrbanMech IIC was thought to be under-appreciated until Clan leadership found that several Society cells were siphoning them into their ranks. The UM-IIC-Z variant is a deadly city combatant whose Heavy Plasma Cannon can vaporize swathes of infantry, chunks of buildings, and vast amounts of enemy armor. Quirk: 360° Torso Twist Drop Cost Multiplier: 1.13

Arm Actuator Limits: Left Upper, Right Upper
content.prevOriginal: Considered lowly, even for garrison troops, the UrbanMech IIC was thought to be under-appreciated until Clan leadership found that several Society cells were siphoning them into their ranks. The UM-IIC-Z variant is a deadly city combatant whose Heavy Plasma Cannon can vaporize swathes of infantry, chunks of buildings, and vast amounts of enemy armor. Quirk: 360° Torso Twist Drop Cost Multiplier: 1.13
content.content:
UrbanMech IIC считался малоценным даже для гарнизонных войск, пока руководство Кланов не обнаружило, что несколько ячеек Общества перетягивают их в свои ряды. Вариант UM-IIC-Z - это смертоносный городской боец, чья Heavy Plasma Cannon способна уничтожать пехоту, куски зданий и огромное количество вражеской брони. Особенность: 360° вращение торса Множитель стоимости высадки: 1.13

Лимит приводов рук: Left Upper, Right Upper

content.original: Despite the Society's distaste for the Warrior Caste's insistance on adhering to zellbrigen, they did see value in attempting to best these warriors in one-on-one combat. The Vapor Eagle Z variant utilizes a Snub-Nosed PPC and a pair of MRM15s to brutalize close-combatants and relies on its speed, Nova CEWS, and torso-mounted cockpit for survivability. Quirk: Nimble Drop Cost Multiplier: 1.19

content.original:
After the relative success of the VTR-9B refits, the Victor IIC was proposed to Clan leadership as the next stage of the design's evolution. The original proposition featured an Endo-Steel frame and an XL engine, the cost of which doomed it to rejection. The VTR-IIC-Z was a small production variantion of these forsaken designs; it features a UAC/20 supported by an array of Society prototypes and electronics, all focused on close-range brawling. Quirk: Rugged Drop Cost Multiplier: 1.28

Arm Actuator Limit: Right Upper
content.prevOriginal:
After the relative success of the VTR-9B refits, the Victor IIC was proposed to Clan leadership as the next stage of the design's evolution. The original proposition featured an Endo-Steel frame and an XL engine which doomed if for rejection due to costs. The VTR-IIC-Z was a small production variantion of these forsaken designs; it featuresa UAC/20 supported by an array of Society prototypes and electronics all focused on close-range brawling. Quirk: Rugged Drop Cost Multiplier: 1.28

Arm Actuator Limit: Right Upper
content.content:
После относительного успеха рефита VTR-9B, руководству Кланов был предложен проект Victor IIC как следующий этап эволюции шасси. Первоначальное предложение включало каркас из эндостали и двигатель XL, из-за чего от меха позже отказались, из-за стоимости. VTR-IIC-Z был мелкосерийным вариантом этого заброшенного шасси; он оснащен UAC/20, поддерживаемым множеством оружий-прототипов от Общества и электроникой, ориентированной на ведение боя на близких дистанциях. Особенность: Прочный Множитель стоимости высадки: 1.28

Лимит приводов рук: Right Upper

content.original:
After the relative success of the VTR-9B refits, the Victor IIC was proposed to Clan leadership as the next stage of the design's evolution. The original proposition featured an Endo-Steel frame and an XL engine, the cost of which doomed it to rejection. The VTR-IIC-ZA was a small production variantion of these forsaken designs; it features an HVAC/20 supported by an array of Society prototypes and electronics aimed at making it a mid-range fire support platform. Quirk: Rugged Drop Cost Multiplier: 1.28

Особенность: Прочный Множитель стоимости высадки: 1.28

Лимит приводов рук: Right Upper

content.original:
The original Warhammer was designed as an assault BattleMech. The Clans wisely maintained and built on this solid frame a real assault 'Mech, the Warhammer IIC. The Z is a Society variant that sports a pair of experimental Heavy Plasma Cannons capable of slagging most anything found on the battlefield. Quirk: Integrated Searchlight Drop Cost Multiplier: 1.28

Arm Actuator Limits: Left Lower, Right Lower

Вариант Z - это вариант от Общества, оснащенный парой экспериментальных Heavy Plasma Cannons, способных уничтожить почти все, что встречается на поле боя. Особенность: Встроенный прожектор Множитель стоимости высадки: 1.28

Лимит приводов рук: Left Lower, Right Lower

content.original: The Ares Medium Tank (S.1) is designed to stand off and take down its enemies at long range. Its top speed of 86 km/h is fast for a fire support vehicle, so it is often paired with APC to support infantry. Four and a half tons of armor protect the vehicle and its crew; this somewhat meager amount encourages Ares crews to stay out of range of most return fire. The main weapon is an ER Large Laser mounted in the turret. Mounted in the front is a Society MRM45 launcher equipped with Apollo ammunition. Biome Restrictions: None. Movement: 5/8 hexes / 150/240 meters. Armor: Ferro-Fibrous (C) Structure: Structure Values A S Front 115 20 Left 90 20 Right 90 20 Rear 75 20 Turret 95 20 Total 465 100 Quirk: Main Battle Tank

content.original: A direct fire, support platform; the Arrow V Carrier is the Society's pre-eminent artillery and anti-air platform. A simple design, the carrier is an updated version of the various carrier platforms used by both the Clans and the Inner Sphere down the centuries. Swapping the traditional ICE for a Standard Fusion Engine allowed the designers to up-armor the chassis. A Guardian ECM and high powered sensor array serves to provide further defense and detection capabilities. The remaining weight is dedicated to a pair of immense Arrow V's and 9 tons of ammo in a CASE protected munitions bay. Biome Restrictions: None. Movement: 3/5 hexes / 90/150 meters. Armor: Armor (C) Structure: Structure Values A S Front 110 30 Left 110 30 Right 110 30 Rear 110 30 Total 440 120 Quirk: Narrow/Low Profile

content.original: The Donar Assault Helicopter is a versatile VTOL that is useful in a variety of roles, similar in concept to the Inner Sphere's Warrior. The helicopter is operated by a pilot and copilot/gunner seated in a tandem configuration, with a limited amount of redundancy in both positions should one or the other be knocked out. Three tons of Compound A2F ferro-fibrous armor keeps it safe from small arms fire, and its rotary blades will remain operational even when hit by 40mm caliber weapons. The well-armored hide also gives the Donar a good survival rate in low-altitude crashes. Like most VTOLs, the Donar is fast, capable of achieving up to 151 km/h. Biome Restrictions: This unit can not deploy in Lunar biomes. Movement: 9/14 hexes / 270/420 meters. Armor: Ferro-Fibrous (C) Structure: Structure Values A S Front 150 15 Left 100 15 Right 100 15 Rear 65 15 Total 430 75 Quirk: Anti-Air Targeting

content.original: Built by the same company that made the Saracen and Scimitar, the Saladin was Scarborough's last medium hover tank. It is unlike its brothers in that the Saladin does not mount a turret, and its only weapon is a heavy, short-range AC/20. Since it's vastly different from the company's other hovercraft, buyers were quite skeptical about purchasing it; Scarborough had to offer incentives like free training and transportation. Soon it became as cheap as the Saracen and spread throughout the whole Inner Sphere. Biome Restrictions: This unit can not deploy in Lunar or Martian biomes due to using an ICE. Movement: 8/12 hexes / 240/360 meters. Armor: Light Ferro Structure: Structure Values A S Front 120 20 Left 90 20 Right 90 20 Rear 60 20 Total 360 80 Quirk: Breaching Shot

content.original: Designed to address the need for a fast and capable scout; and to rapidly upgrade the Star League era units the Society had acquired from forgotten Brian Caches, the Zephyr-Z is a complete upgrade package. A combination of a TAG, Nova CEWS and a brand new Streak Narc allow the Zephyr to act as both a scout and a spotter, whilst a pair of Improved Heavy Medium Lasers provide a potent sting should the Zephyr stumble on enemy scouts or scout hunters. Biome Restrictions: None. Movement: 9/14 hexes / 270/420 meters. Armor: Ferro-Fibrous (C) Structure: Structure Values A S Front 170 20 Left 140 20 Right 140 20 Rear 120 20 Turret 150 20 Total 720 100 Quirk: Improved Jammer

content.original: The Ares Medium Tank (S.1) is designed to stand off and take down its enemies at long range. Its top speed of 86 km/h is fast for a fire support vehicle, so it is often paired with APC to support infantry. Four and a half tons of armor protect the vehicle and its crew; this somewhat meager amount encourages Ares crews to stay out of range of most return fire. The main weapon is an ER Large Laser mounted in the turret. Mounted in the front is a Society MRM45 launcher equipped with Apollo ammunition. Biome Restrictions: None. Movement: 5/8 hexes / 150/240 meters. Armor: Ferro-Fibrous (C) Structure: Structure Values A S Front 115 20 Left 90 20 Right 90 20 Rear 75 20 Turret 95 20 Total 465 100 Quirk: Main Battle Tank

content.original: A direct fire, support platform; the Arrow V Carrier is the Society's pre-eminent artillery and anti-air platform. A simple design, the carrier is an updated version of the various carrier platforms used by both the Clans and the Inner Sphere down the centuries. Swapping the traditional ICE for a Standard Fusion Engine allowed the designers to up-armor the chassis. A Guardian ECM and high powered sensor array serves to provide further defense and detection capabilities. The remaining weight is dedicated to a pair of immense Arrow V's and 9 tons of ammo in a CASE protected munitions bay. Biome Restrictions: None. Movement: 3/5 hexes / 90/150 meters. Armor: Armor (C) Structure: Structure Values A S Front 110 30 Left 110 30 Right 110 30 Rear 110 30 Total 440 120 Quirk: Narrow/Low Profile

content.original: The Donar Assault Helicopter is a versatile VTOL that is useful in a variety of roles, similar in concept to the Inner Sphere's Warrior. The helicopter is operated by a pilot and copilot/gunner seated in a tandem configuration, with a limited amount of redundancy in both positions should one or the other be knocked out. Three tons of Compound A2F ferro-fibrous armor keeps it safe from small arms fire, and its rotary blades will remain operational even when hit by 40mm caliber weapons. The well-armored hide also gives the Donar a good survival rate in low-altitude crashes. Like most VTOLs, the Donar is fast, capable of achieving up to 151 km/h. Biome Restrictions: This unit can not deploy in Lunar biomes. Movement: 9/14 hexes / 270/420 meters. Armor: Ferro-Fibrous (C) Structure: Structure Values A S Front 150 15 Left 100 15 Right 100 15 Rear 65 15 Total 430 75 Quirk: Anti-Air Targeting

content.original: The Donar Assault Helicopter is a versatile VTOL that is useful in a variety of roles, similar in concept to the Inner Sphere's Warrior. The helicopter is operated by a pilot and copilot/gunner seated in a tandem configuration, with a limited amount of redundancy in both positions should one or the other be knocked out. Three tons of Compound A2F ferro-fibrous armor keeps it safe from small arms fire, and its rotary blades will remain operational even when hit by 40mm caliber weapons. The well-armored hide also gives the Donar a good survival rate in low-altitude crashes. Like most VTOLs, the Donar is fast, capable of achieving up to 151 km/h. Biome Restrictions: This unit can not deploy in Lunar biomes. Movement: 9/14 hexes / 270/420 meters. Armor: Ferro-Fibrous (C) Structure: Structure Values A S Front 175 15 Left 80 15 Right 80 15 Rear 80 15 Total 430 75 Quirk: Anti-Air Targeting

content.original: Built by the same company that made the Saracen and Scimitar, the Saladin was Scarborough's last medium hover tank. It is unlike its brothers in that the Saladin does not mount a turret, and its only weapon is a heavy, short-range AC/20. Since it's vastly different from the company's other hovercraft, buyers were quite skeptical about purchasing it; Scarborough had to offer incentives like free training and transportation. Soon it became as cheap as the Saracen and spread throughout the whole Inner Sphere. Biome Restrictions: This unit can not deploy in Lunar or Martian biomes due to using an ICE. Movement: 8/12 hexes / 240/360 meters. Armor: Light Ferro Structure: Structure Values A S Front 120 20 Left 90 20 Right 90 20 Rear 60 20 Total 360 80 Quirk: Breaching Shot

content.original: Designed to address the need for a fast and capable scout; and to rapidly upgrade the Star League era units the Society had acquired from forgotten Brian Caches, the Zephyr-Z is a complete upgrade package. A combination of a TAG, Nova CEWS and a brand new Streak Narc allow the Zephyr to act as both a scout and a spotter, whilst a pair of Improved Heavy Medium Lasers provide a potent sting should the Zephyr stumble on enemy scouts or scout hunters. Biome Restrictions: None. Movement: 9/14 hexes / 270/420 meters. Armor: Ferro-Fibrous (C) Structure: Structure Values A S Front 170 20 Left 140 20 Right 140 20 Rear 120 20 Turret 150 20 Total 720 100 Quirk: Improved Jammer

content.original: Designed to take down a multitude of targets, including aerospace assets and small craft, the Arrow V Missile features a powerful warhead capable of being reconfigured in the launcher moments before use to allow the pilot to cater the missile to his needs. Despite the project being rejected by Clan leadership, Society member cells continued its development and eventual production. The Arrow V utilizes advanced internal fire control systems, inluced Streak technology, which render it incapable of indirect fire. Uses ArrowV Ammo.

content.original: The Hypervelocity Autocannon (HVAC) family of weapons is based on the Autocannon. While they have the same damage classes, they're capable of firing much further. Once members of the Society discovered the use of these weapons in the Inner Sphere, they immediate developed and proposed their own prototypes to Clan leadership. While rejected by the Khans, HVAC (S) cannons were found amongst the Society 'Mechs and vehicles used during the Wars of Reaving. Uses HVAC10 Ammo.

content.original: Plasma Cannons accelerate and superheat a cartridge of 'plastic foam' into an excited state and release it as plasma, creating a tremendous kinetic and thermal impact. Society scientists developed the Heavy Plasma Cannon as a deadly combination of heat build-up and immediate material destruction resulting in a weapon that generates more heat than the Clan Plasma Cannon while hitting about as hard as an ERPPC at close ranges all at the cost of tremendous heat build-up.VOLATILE! Uses Plasma Ammo.

content.original: The Light Ultra Gauss Rifle started life is a discarded attempt at further reducing Gauss Rifle weights as the damage output was too low to be acceptable. It was not until a cabal of Society scientists applied several lessons learned from the Hyper Assualt Gauss rifle projects that the abondoned light-weight gauss rifle project gained new life as the Light Ultra Gauss Rifle. The LUGR is capable of firing at twice the rate of standard Gauss rifles with a minor risk of jamming like it's conventional Ultra Autocannon cousins. Uses Light Gauss Ammo. VOLATILE!

content.original: From all reports, it seemed that,despite numerous attempts, Clan Scientists never seemed to fully realize a Mech-scale Heavy Gauss Rifle. This is only partially true, by 3062 members of the Society had come close to finishing their secret development a prototype that rivaled the new Heavy Gauss Rifle being sported by Inner Sphere forces. Rushed into production at the onset of the Jihad and Wars of Reaving, the Clan Heavy Gauss Rifle may benefit from the same weight-saving technologies as Clan Gauss Rifle but has considerable reliablitity issues and the vast capacitor banks can cause an incredible explosion if damaged. Uses Heavy Gauss Ammo. VOLATILE!
content.prevOriginal: From all reports, it seemed that,despite numerous attempts, Clan Scientists never seemed to fully realize a Mech-scale Heavy Gauss Rifle. This is only partially true, by 3062 members of the Society had come close to finishing their secret development a prototype that rivaled the new Heavy Gauss Rifle being sported by Inner Sphere forces. Rushed into production at the onset of the Jihad and Wars of Reaving, the Clan Heavy Gauss Rifle may benefit from the same weight-saving technologies as Clan Gauss Rifle but has considerable reliablitity issues and the vast capacitor banks can cause an incredible explosion if damaged. Uses Heavy Gauss Ammo. VOLATILE!

content.original: After witnessing the relative success of the cheap, easy to manufacture, Medium Range Missile systems utilized in the Inner Sphere, several Society cells began secret development their own versions for their forces. Though these new Clan-Tech MRM systems benefited from the same weight-saving technologies as Clan-Tech SRMs and LRMs, Society leaders decided that additional tubes were necessary to ensure that the lesser-trained Society pilots could effectively saturate the target area. Uses MRM Ammo.
content.prevOriginal: After witnessing the relative success of the cheap, easy to manufacture, Medium Range Missile systems utilized in the Inner Sphere, several Society cells began secret development their own versions for their forces. Though these new Clan-Tech MRM systems benefited from the same weight-saving technologies as Clan-Tech SRMs and LRMs, Society leaders decided that additional tubes were necessary to ensure that the lesser-trained Society pilots could effectively saturate the target area. Uses MRM Ammo.
content.content: Увидев во Внутренней Сфере относительный успех дешевых и простых в производстве ракетных систем средней дальности, несколько ячеек Общества начали тайную разработку собственных версий для своих войск. Несмотря на то, что новые клановые MRM использовали те же технологии экономии веса, что и клановые SRM и LRM, лидеры Общества решили, что необходимо добавить больше стволов для того, чтобы малообученные пилоты Общества могли эффективно заливать целевую область. Uses MRM Ammo.

content.original: The Timed Adhesive Explosive, TAE, is just a fancy designation for a fairly cheap, low-tech, explosive device that utilizes a combination of magnets and adhesive gels to stick to a variety of targets. Originally intended for use by Society pilots as an area-deniable tool, the small dispenser and powerful explosives led to many pilots finding creative uses for the device. VOLATILE!

content.original: The Snub-Nose PPC is to a Particle Projector Cannon as a sawed-off shotgun is to a shotgun. This version of the PPC is slightly lighter than a standard PPC, but its energy discharge trails off considerably faster, leading to shorter range and reduced damage capacity over range. Despite almost no Snub-Nose PPCs surviving the Exodus, Society scientists saw enough potential to apply more modern PPC technology to the orginal design, leading to a higher damage capacity and less damage drop-off out to long ranges.

content.original: Utilizing Streak missile guidance technology, the Streak NARC Launcher is an attempt to ensure pilots attach the pod to the correct target. This launcher fires a single NARC beacon that attaches itself to the enemy and emits a homing signal for all friendly weapons. Uses Streak NARC Ammo.

content.original: Ammo Bins contain the rounds needed for projectile-based weaponry, with at least one bin required per weapon type. Upon receiving a Critical Hit, any remaining ammunition stored inside an Ammo Bin will explode dealing damage to the install location. Risk can be mitigated with the use of C.A.S.E.

content.content: Контейнеры с боеприпасами содержат патроны, необходимые для оружия снарядного типа, причем для каждого типа оружия требуется как минимум один контейнер. При получении крита, все оставшиеся боеприпасы взрываются, нанося урон своей локации. Риск может быть уменьшен с помощью C.A.S.E.

content.content: Контейнеры с боеприпасами содержат патроны, необходимые для оружия снарядного типа, причем для каждого типа оружия требуется как минимум один контейнер. Не взрывается.

content.original: Ammo Heavy Gauss AP
content.prevOriginal: Ammo Heavy Gauss AP
content.content: Ammo Heavy Gauss AP

content.original: Heavy Gauss ammo fires a heavier projectile drastically reducing range but increasing the damage profile. Does not explode.
content.prevOriginal: Heavy Gauss ammo fires a heavier projectile drastically reducing range but increasing the damage profile. Does not explode.
content.content: Heavy Gauss стреляет более тяжелыми снарядами, что резко снижает дальность стрельбы, но увеличивает наносимый урон. Не взрывается.

content.original: Ammo Light Gauss AP
content.prevOriginal: Ammo Light Gauss AP
content.content: Ammo Light Gauss AP

content.original: Light Gauss have a better ballistic profile allowing a slug to travel further but have reduced damage and a longer minimum range. Does not explode.
content.prevOriginal: Light Gauss have a better ballistic profile allowing a slug to travel further but have reduced damage and a longer minimum range. Does not explode.
content.content: Легкая пушка Гаусса имеет лучший баллистический профиль, позволяющий снаряду лететь дальше, но имеет меньший урон и большую минимальную дальность. Не взрывается.

content.original: Ammo MRM (C)
content.prevOriginal: Ammo MRM (C)
content.content: Ammo MRM (C)

content.original: Ammo Bins contain the rounds needed for projectile-based weaponry, with at least one bin required per weapon type. Upon receiving a Critical Hit, any remaining ammunition stored inside an Ammo Bin will explode dealing damage to the install location. Risk can be mitigated with the use of C.A.S.E.
content.prevOriginal: Ammo Bins contain the rounds needed for projectile-based weaponry, with at least one bin required per weapon type. Upon receiving a Critical Hit, any remaining ammunition stored inside an Ammo Bin will explode dealing damage to the install location. Risk can be mitigated with the use of C.A.S.E.
content.content: Контейнеры с боеприпасами содержат патроны, необходимые для оружия снарядного типа, причем для каждого типа оружия требуется как минимум один контейнер. При получении крита, все оставшиеся боеприпасы взрываются, нанося урон своей локации. Риск может быть уменьшен с помощью C.A.S.E.

content.original: Ammo MRM EMP (C)
content.prevOriginal: Ammo MRM EMP (C)
content.content: Ammo MRM EMP (C)

content.original: Though they do inflict damage directly on a target, what makes these munitions so effective is their secondary effects. The warheads blanket the target in electromagnetic noise, causing the target to move more slowly, overheat, and interfere with sensor systems.  Upon receiving a Critical Hit, any remaining ammunition stored inside an Ammo Bin will explode dealing damage to the install location. Risk can be mitigated with the use of C.A.S.E.

content.original: Ammo MRM Hunter-Killer (C)
content.prevOriginal: Ammo MRM Hunter-Killer (C)
content.content: Ammo MRM Hunter-Killer (C)

content.original: An attempt to bring on-board guidance systems back to MRM munitions, Hunter-Killer missiles sacrifice yield and range for powerful fire-and-forget systems on each warhead that build upon targeting data provided from the Mech-board Artemis IV FCS.  Upon receiving a Critical Hit, any remaining ammunition stored inside an Ammo Bin will explode dealing damage to the install location. Risk can be mitigated with the use of C.A.S.E.

content.original: Kinetic-Kill rockets replace their explosive payload with a heavy metal dart and additional fuel accelerate up to high velocities. They penetrate armor well, but require time to reach full velocity. Damage increases at longer range.  Upon receiving a Critical Hit, any remaining ammunition stored inside an Ammo Bin will explode dealing damage to the install location. Risk can be mitigated with the use of C.A.S.E.

content.original: Slower than the Medium Tank, but possessing heavier armor and fire power, the Heavy Tank is a fearsome combatant. Packing a potent array of heavy weapons, the Heavy Tank is a serious threat to any Tank or Mech that encounters it. Biome Restrictions: None. Movement: 4/6 hexes / 120/180 meters. Armor: Glazed (C) Structure: Structure Values A S Front 280 30 Left 235 30 Right 235 30 Rear 190 30 Turret 220 30 Total 1160 150 Quirk: Main Battle Tank
content.prevOriginal: Slower than the Medium Tank, but possessing heavier armor and fire power, the Heavy Tank is a fearsome combatant. content.content: Более медленный, чем средний танк, но обладающий более мощной броней и огневой мощью, тяжелый танк представляет собой грозную боевую единицу. Обладая мощным вооружением, тяжелый танк представляет собой серьезную угрозу для любого танка или меха на его пути. Ограничения биома: нет. Передвижение: 4/6 hexes / 120/180 meters. content.original: [Society Version] The Hadur Fast Support Vehicle was developed by Clan Hell's Horses and introduced in 3102. Capable of reaching a top speed of 151 km/h, the Hadur can quickly position itself to provide heavy missile artillery support. It performs best when paired with forward scouts like the Asshur scout. The crew is protected by six tons of standard plate armor. The primary weapon of the Hadur is the Class 16 Arrow IV launcher. This massive weapon provides missile artillery support to friendly forces. However, unlike the Naga OmniMech, the Hadur has a single twenty round magazine instead of four smaller five round magazines. This means that switching ammunition types is a problem for Hadur crews. To remedy this, the Horses typically load the magazine with homing Arrow IV rounds. Biome Restrictions: None. Movement: 9/14 hexes / 270/420 meters. Armor: Armor (C) Structure: Structure Values A S Front 125 25 Left 100 25 Right 100 25 Rear 80 25 Turret 100 25 Total 505 125 Quirk: Improved Sensors

content.original: The Lightning was designed for the Star League by Curtiss Industries as a hovercraft combat vehicle designed to take down slow BattleMechs and vehicles. Some commanders would combine several Lightnings into a temporary compact unit to crush the hostile line, using their maneuverability to break up formations. A interesting feature of the Lightning is a low wing mounted on the rear of the vehicle that increases the vehicle's stability at high speed. Biome Restrictions: None. Movement: 11/17 hexes / 330/510 meters. Armor: Ferro-Fibrous Structure: Structure Values A S Front 120 20 Left 85 20 Right 85 20 Rear 50 20 Total 340 80 Quirk: Narrow/Low Profile

content.original: Originally developed by Vitesse Vehicles of Terra in 2611, the Prowler Multi-Terrain-Vehicle was the most common hostile and exotic environment military-grade exploration vehicles. The Prowler was almost unsurpassed in its niche, the design proving popular enough for Vitesse to halt production and merely license the design to manufacturers across the Inner Sphere and Periphery. While never produced in large numbers, all post–Star League era Successor State militaries maintained a number of the vehicle for combat on their most inhospitable planets. Biome Restrictions: None. Movement: 4/6 hexes / 120/180 meters. Armor: Armor (C) Structure: Environmental Sealing Values A S Front 145 30 Left 125 30 Right 125 30 Rear 100 30 Turret 135 30 Total 630 150 Quirk: Enhanced FPE Can carry 1 Battle Armor Squads. Has firing ports.

content.original: Developed by the Society to bolster their forces, the Rhino (S) is a converted series of SLDF Rhinos pulled out of Society owned Brian Caches. Stripping off the original weapons array, the Society opted to utilize weapons that would compensate for the poor skills of their troops. Clan Medium Pulse Lasers replace the Inner Sphere versions, while the LRM-20’s are swapped for Streak LRM-20’s. The front mounted LRM-10 is removed in favour of a pair of Streak SRM-6's and the Guardian ECM has been swapped for a Nova CEWS. The rest of the tank is unchanged from the original spec. Biome Restrictions: None. Movement: 3/5 hexes / 90/150 meters. Armor: Armor (C) Structure: Structure Values A S Front 345 40 Left 275 40 Right 275 40 Rear 200 40 Turret 310 40 Total 1405 200 Quirk: Improved Targeting - Long

content.original: Despite the Society's distaste for the Warrior Caste's insistence on adhering to zellbrigen, they did see value in attempting to best these warriors in one-on-one combat. The Vapor Eagle Z variant utilizes a Snub-Nosed PPC and a pair of MRM15s to brutalize close-combatants and relies on its speed, Nova CEWS, and torso-mounted cockpit for survivability. Quirk: Nimble Drop Cost Multiplier: 1.19

content.original: The Society Light Fusion Engine is mechanically similar to an XL Engine, but features a built-in supercharger to improve peformance in short bursts. The Light Fusion engine is 75% the mass for the same performance, but intrudes into the side torso bays of a BattleMech. Due to the volatile nature of the built-in supercharger and the middling weight-savings, these engines were not very popular.

content.original: Slower than the Medium Tank, but possessing heavier armor and fire power, the Heavy Tank is a fearsome combatant. Packing a potent array of heavy weapons, the Heavy Tank is a serious threat to any Tank or Mech that encounters it. Biome Restrictions: None. Movement: 4/6 hexes / 120/180 meters. Armor: Glazed (C) Structure: Structure Values A S Front 280 30 Left 235 30 Right 235 30 Rear 190 30 Turret 220 30 Total 1160 150 Quirk: Main Battle Tank

content.content: Более медленный, чем средний танк, но обладающий более мощной броней и огневой мощью, тяжелый танк представляет собой грозную боевую единицу. Обладая мощным вооружением, тяжелый танк представляет собой серьезную угрозу для любого танка или меха на его пути. Ограничения биома: нет. Передвижение: 4/6 hexes / 120/180 meters. content.original: [Society Version] The Hadur Fast Support Vehicle was developed by Clan Hell's Horses and introduced in 3102. Capable of reaching a top speed of 151 km/h, the Hadur can quickly position itself to provide heavy missile artillery support. It performs best when paired with forward scouts like the Asshur scout. The crew is protected by six tons of standard plate armor. The primary weapon of the Hadur is the Class 16 Arrow IV launcher. This massive weapon provides missile artillery support to friendly forces. However, unlike the Naga OmniMech, the Hadur has a single twenty round magazine instead of four smaller five round magazines. This means that switching ammunition types is a problem for Hadur crews. To remedy this, the Horses typically load the magazine with homing Arrow IV rounds. Biome Restrictions: None. Movement: 9/14 hexes / 270/420 meters. Armor: Armor (C) Structure: Structure Values A S Front 125 25 Left 100 25 Right 100 25 Rear 80 25 Turret 100 25 Total 505 125 Quirk: Improved Sensors
